title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
OB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user goes to Preferences > Workbench and selects "Perform build automatically on resource modification". The "Build" menu option still appears in the Java popup menus.
EB: The "Build" action in the context sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective should only be enabled when the user has not selected "Perform build automatically on resource modification" in the Preferences > Workbench settings.
SR:
To reproduce, follow these steps:
1. Open the Java perspective.
2. Go to Preferences > Workbench.
3. Select the "Perform build automatically on resource modification" option.
4. Close the preferences window.
5. Right-click on any Java file in the Java perspective.
6. Observe that the "Build" action is still enabled in the context sensitive popup menu.
